system.note: Psykers in blast radius must make -10 Willpower Test or be stunned for 1d5+3 rounds. Daemons must make +0 Willpower Test or take 3d10 E Damage and be stunned for 1d5 Rounds.

description.value:
Special: Blast (3)

Note: Psykers in blast radius must make -10 Willpower Test or be stunned for 1d5+3 rounds. Daemons must make +0 Willpower Test or take 3d10 E Damage and be stunned for 1d5 Rounds.
